ComicInfo.Summary:
Maximum Overkill: Team Youngblood tries to track down Gage but finds he has gathered a group of powerful allies. Badrock battles Overtkill.
Melting Points - Part Two: Sentinel basically designs a battle suit and becomes a hero to impress a pretty scientist.
ComicInfo.Title: Maximum Overkill; Melting Points - Part Two
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric Stephenson,Rob Liefeld,Robert Loren Fleming,Eric Stephenson,Rob Liefeld,Robert Loren Fleming
